author: Danielle Dulin
text:
We are developing a retention policy for automated license plate reader images and in-car and/or body-mounted camera video/audio retention.  To date, we have retained all video footage since the implementation of the cameras, but we are quickly running out of storage space.  I have seen a range of suggested retention periods (anywhere from 5 years to a few weeks), but what is generally accepted in the public safety community?  
Additionally, I 'd like to see examples of retention policies. 
I appreciate any help.
title: Automated License Plate Reader and In-car/body-mounted image/video retention policies
